channel.title: SEXY-TurmoilPkerz-SEXY
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/903/turmoilpkzerforumbanner.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=36pt]Source And Client Coming Soon [/size] [/center]
[center][size=20pt]Features:[/size][/center]
[center]- New Hit Splats - Highscores - Double Xp Weekends - Automated Voting Rewards - Skill Points - 100% Summoning skill, familiars with effects - Unique Slayer Tasks - Dragonfire Shields charged by dragons - All Skillcapes with working emotes - Economy! All dupes are patched - Dragon Defender! - All PvP Armor: Vesta, Statius, Morrigan, Zuriel - Pk Point Shops - 100% Working Overloads and Spec Restores! - Elysian and Divine Spirit Shield effects! - Rocktail Fishing+Cooking! With eating effects!
100% Curses PVM+PVP
- Protect Item - All Saps - All Deflects - Berserker - All Leeches - Wrath - Soul Split - Turmoil
Minigames
- Barrows - Pest Control - Tzhaar Cave - Fight Pits - Duel Arena - Warrior Guild!
Turmoil effects -
Increases attack and defence by 15%, plus 15% of enemy¹s level, and strength by 23%, plus 10% of enemy¹s level.
Soul split effects -
20% of damage done to NPCS is added to your health. 40% of damage done to players is added to your health.
- Divine and Elysian spirit shields effect are accurate to RS. (E.G. Divine blocks 30% of damage, and Elysian has a 70% chance of blocking 25% of damage.)
- Great rewards system based upon how many player killer points you have.
- Chaotic staff and arcane stream necklace have magic attack bonuses for higher magic hits.
- All PVP weapons with correct specials.(E.G. Statius¹s warhammer reduces enemies defense.)
- Godwars dungeon and bosses working 100%(Ten Kills needed to get into a boss chamber.)
- All specials for correct weapons working 100%
- Unique monster teleports and bosses to kill for many items.
- Great PVM system which currently has realistic hits, max hits.
- Good XP rates.
- Good skilling .(Some skills need to be fixed up, but they work overall.)
- Many minigames to be played. (E.G. Champions Challenge, Fight cave, Duel arena, Barrows.
- Daily updates and bug fixes. [/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/Capture-1.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/fsfer.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/banktab.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/1-2.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/primal-1.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/torva-2.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=14pt]Will be releasing soon more comments[/size] [size=36pt][/size][/center]

  • Divine and Elysian spirit shields effect are accurate to RS. (E.G. Divine blocks 30% of damage, and Elysian has a 70% chance of blocking 25% of damage.)
